p: The human cancer cell lines – ductal carcinoma (BT474, ATCC HTB-20), bronchogenic carcinoma (Chago K1, ATCC HTB-168TB), liver hepatoblastoma (Hep G2, ATCC HB-8065), gastric carcinoma (Kato III, ATCC HTB-103), and colon adenocarcinoma (SW 620, ATCC CCL-227) – were obtained from the Institute of Biotechnology and Genetic Engineering, Chulalongkorn University, Thailand.
